title: Any news on the warwick rework?
body: Went over his rework kit again and sighed because i love magewick but that magewick looks 10 times better.

replies.body: warwick doesn't need a rework as bad as yorick or taric

yes he does. he is singlehandedly undoubtedly THE most basic/lowest skillcap champion in the game. its wrong to say he doesnt need a rework just cos if he somehow manages to snowball he goes further out of control than yorick.....or taric i guess. same goes for when his winrate was +58% a while back, more than once, if you were playing then. those are times that give riot more reason to rework him as the determination of him being OP or useless is at a higher range than any champ based on riots changes at the times
Backburner, sorry. I'll have to go look for the quote, but his rework has been shelved again for the time being.

Ah, there we go;

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ll6gkAek,comment-id=003b000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-08T07:13:46.261+0000)
>
> Not actively being worked on, besides some ideas being tossed around for possible directions. As far as full reworks go Taric and Yorick at the least will come out before him, possibly others. Assuming we do go for a full rework on him eventually it'll be quite a way away as a result.

Not much, but whoever was on it, isn't right now.
